name: CV/Resume Builder
desc: The Resume Builder project is a web application developed using React.js, designed to assist users in creating professional resumes effortlessly.

name: To-Do App
desc: The To-Do App is a simple web application created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to help users organize their tasks effectively.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
desc: The Rock, Paper, Scissors Game is a web-based application developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It simulates the classic game to determine the winner based on predefined rules.

name: Currency Converter
desc: JS-based currency converter using real-time API for instant currency exchange.

name: Focus Timer (Chrome Extn.)
desc: A Chrome extension leveraging web APIs for a focused productivity timer, enhancing workflow efficiency with customizable time management tools.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal Portfolio Website. Don't Need Much Info About It, Just Scroll Down. You're Here Only!

name: Cat vs Dog Image Classifier Using ML
desc: A CNN model using Adam optimisation and regularisation techniques to classify images of cats and dogs with high accuracy.

name: Delhi Real Estates Price Predictor
desc: Predictive model for Delhi real estate prices, leveraging data analysis and machine learning algorithms to forecast property values.
